<p><img src="https://img2023.cnblogs.com/blog/2105804/202504/2105804-20250409031437583-239351076.gif" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<p><img src="https://img2023.cnblogs.com/blog/2105804/202504/2105804-20250430113321453-1592823229.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>许多人对AI知识库的理解是：只需将所有资料拖入AI客户端（如Cherry Studio），AI便会自动阅读并生成完美结论。</p>
<p><img src="https://img2023.cnblogs.com/blog/2105804/202504/2105804-20250429192420383-911411938.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<p><img src="https://img2023.cnblogs.com/blog/2105804/202504/2105804-20250429192512813-2036163260.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>但实际体验后，大家发现AI知识库效果远不如预期，经常出现各种问题。</p>
<h2 id="技术原理与局限">技术原理与局限</h2>
<p>本文将从原理出发，分析AI知识库的技术局限，并介绍进阶方案，如重排序模型、数据库（MCP server）和超长上下文模型等。</p>
<p>目前主流的大模型知识库采用RAG（检索增强生成）技术。</p>
<p>用户添加资料时，系统会先将其拆分为多个文本块。</p>
<p><img src="https://img2023.cnblogs.com/blog/2105804/202504/2105804-20250429194955186-1501552785.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>随后，嵌入模型将这些文本块向量化，即将文本转为一组超长数字序列。</p>
<p><img src="https://img2023.cnblogs.com/blog/2105804/202504/2105804-20250429195530514-1219364926.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>以我的知识库为例，嵌入模型输出1024维向量：</p>
<p><img src="https://img2023.cnblogs.com/blog/2105804/202504/2105804-20250429195705226-1253694474.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>每个文本块都被转为1024个数值组成的向量：</p>
<p><img src="https://img2023.cnblogs.com/blog/2105804/202504/2105804-20250429195950623-1194851168.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>系统将向量及对应文本存入向量数据库。</p>
<p><img src="https://img2023.cnblogs.com/blog/2105804/202504/2105804-20250429200209340-662975629.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>用户提问时，问题同样被向量化为1024维向量。</p>
<p><img src="https://img2023.cnblogs.com/blog/2105804/202504/2105804-20250429213421777-1817265815.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>系统将问题向量与数据库中所有向量进行相似度计算，完全基于数学运算。</p>
<p><img src="https://img2023.cnblogs.com/blog/2105804/202504/2105804-20250429213645583-1799810804.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>最终，知识库选出最相似的原文片段，与用户问题一同发送给大模型，由其归纳总结。</p>
<p><img src="https://img2023.cnblogs.com/blog/2105804/202504/2105804-20250429214138843-1264554988.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>可见，在RAG架构中，大模型主要负责归纳总结，答复质量很大程度取决于检索精度。RAG系统普遍存在分块粗糙、检索不准、缺乏全局视角等问题。</p>

<h2 id="rag知识库的缺陷与改进">RAG知识库的缺陷与改进</h2>
<h3 id="分块方式简单">分块方式简单</h3>
<p>这种分块方式基本按段落分块，段落过长则按固定字数切分，常导致句子被截断。</p>
<p>以刚检索到的“刘备”为例：</p>
<p><img src="https://img2023.cnblogs.com/blog/2105804/202504/2105804-20250430151459639-1035054721.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>可见“：”前内容被截断，结尾“虽是”也未说完。由于分块上限为300字，前后句被强行截断。</p>
<p>这暴露了RAG知识库的缺陷：分块粗糙，AI难以理解上下文，导致回答不精准。</p>
<p>虽然也有基于语义分析的分块方法，但目前大多不成熟，效果甚至不如简单分割。</p>
<h3 id="检索不精准">检索不精准</h3>
<p>RAG的另一个问题是检索不准。例如搜索“曹操兵器”，想找倚天剑的信息。</p>
<p>系统仅基于数字相似度匹配，无法真正理解文本含义，筛选片段可能相关也可能无关，难以精准匹配。</p>
<p><img src="https://img2023.cnblogs.com/blog/2105804/202504/2105804-20250430152557929-1052262168.png" alt="" loading="lazy"><br>
<img src="https://img2023.cnblogs.com/blog/2105804/202504/2105804-20250430152730896-198232544.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>匹配结果往往不是所需信息，这是RAG系统的痛点之一。</p>
<p>较好的改进方案是引入重排序模型。先用向量数据库初步检索，再用重排序模型做语义分析，根据相关性重新排序。</p>
<p><img src="https://img2023.cnblogs.com/blog/2105804/202504/2105804-20250430153737727-858297771.png" alt="" loading="lazy"><br>
<img src="https://img2023.cnblogs.com/blog/2105804/202504/2105804-20250430154018440-1845891536.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>以“曹操兵器”为例，添加重排序模型后，效果明显提升。进入模型服务，找到硅基流动，添加重排序模型。</p>
<p><img src="https://img2023.cnblogs.com/blog/2105804/202504/2105804-20250430154858029-929491136.png" alt="" loading="lazy"><br>
<img src="https://img2023.cnblogs.com/blog/2105804/202504/2105804-20250430154928837-1370988293.png" alt="" loading="lazy"><br>
<img src="https://img2023.cnblogs.com/blog/2105804/202504/2105804-20250430155031613-1276303404.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>复制免费重排序模型名称，回到Cherry Studio添加。</p>
<p><img src="https://img2023.cnblogs.com/blog/2105804/202505/2105804-20250501145359993-870582237.png" alt="" loading="lazy"><br>
<img src="https://img2023.cnblogs.com/blog/2105804/202505/2105804-20250501145457218-2135493368.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>在知识库设置中添加重排序模型，点击确定。</p>
<p><img src="https://img2023.cnblogs.com/blog/2105804/202505/2105804-20250501145526642-1937286570.png" alt="" loading="lazy"><br>
<img src="https://img2023.cnblogs.com/blog/2105804/202505/2105804-20250501145604456-1366573556.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>再次搜索“曹操兵器”，倚天剑信息排到第二位，分数78%。重排序模型显著提升了检索精度。</p>
<p><img src="https://img2023.cnblogs.com/blog/2105804/202505/2105804-20250501153705815-393627425.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<h3 id="缺乏全局视角">缺乏全局视角</h3>
<p>第三个痛点是缺乏全局视角。以AI生成的300条学生统计数据为例：</p>
<p><img src="https://img2023.cnblogs.com/blog/2105804/202505/2105804-20250501154037993-1973827405.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>如需统计分析（如最大最小值），RAG难以胜任。向量数据库只能匹配文本块，无法整体分析。</p>
<p>将Excel文件添加到知识库：</p>
<p><img src="https://img2023.cnblogs.com/blog/2105804/202505/2105804-20250501154256715-1816798010.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>在聊天界面（使用DeepSeek，硅基流动提供），开启知识库。</p>
<p><img src="https://img2023.cnblogs.com/blog/2105804/202505/2105804-20250501154533406-2010864680.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>提问“共有多少学生”，AI仅获取六个片段。</p>
<p><img src="https://img2023.cnblogs.com/blog/2105804/202505/2105804-20250501155453606-183186230.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>实际有300个学生。</p>
<p><img src="https://img2023.cnblogs.com/blog/2105804/202505/2105804-20250501155553021-664871262.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>AI却答120个。</p>
<p><img src="https://img2023.cnblogs.com/blog/2105804/202505/2105804-20250501155604602-543502869.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>因此，结构化或统计性问题建议用关系型数据库。现在可通过MCP让AI操作数据库，效果更佳。</p>

<h3 id="数据库接入mcp-server">数据库接入MCP Server</h3>
<p>在MCP配置页面查找PostgreSQL MCP。可参考官方GitHub：<a href="https://github.com/modelcontextprotocol/servers/tree/main/src/postgres" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow">PostgreSQL MCP</a></p>
<p>复制官方配置内容，粘贴到Cherry Studio。</p>
<p><img src="https://img2023.cnblogs.com/blog/2105804/202505/2105804-20250502114425443-228223137.png" alt="" loading="lazy"><br>
<img src="https://img2023.cnblogs.com/blog/2105804/202505/2105804-20250502114510383-1971372070.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>将 <code>postgresql://localhost/mydb</code> 替换为自己的数据库地址，格式如下：</p>
<pre><code class="language-json">"postgresql://&lt;user&gt;:&lt;password&gt;@&lt;host&gt;:&lt;port&gt;/&lt;database&gt;"
</code></pre>
<p>示例（已脱敏）：</p>
<pre><code class="language-json">postgresql://db_user:db_password@db-host.example.com:5432/dbname?sslmode=require
</code></pre>
<ul>
<li><code>db_user</code>：数据库用户名</li>
<li><code>db_password</code>：密码</li>
<li><code>db-host.example.com</code>：主机地址</li>
<li><code>5432</code>：端口（默认5432）</li>
<li><code>dbname</code>：数据库名</li>
<li><code>sslmode=require</code>：强制SSL加密</li>
</ul>
<p>点击确定，启动服务。</p>
<p><img src="https://img2023.cnblogs.com/blog/2105804/202505/2105804-20250502170749187-1127196873.png" alt="" loading="lazy"><br>
<img src="https://img2023.cnblogs.com/blog/2105804/202505/2105804-20250502125317059-1895634060.png" alt="" loading="lazy"><br>
<img src="https://img2023.cnblogs.com/blog/2105804/202505/2105804-20250502125331488-1880053985.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<h3 id="系统提示词配置">系统提示词配置</h3>
<p>回到聊天界面（需选择支持函数调用的模型，模型名后有扳手图标），选择刚配置的Postgres MCP服务器。</p>
<p><img src="https://img2023.cnblogs.com/blog/2105804/202505/2105804-20250502125444020-843288425.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>编辑系统提示词，先提供数据库表结构信息。</p>
<p>扩展两张表：课程表和选课成绩表。</p>
<p><img src="https://img2023.cnblogs.com/blog/2105804/202505/2105804-20250502130956346-1352334141.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<pre><code class="language-json">你是数据库助手，以下是PostgreSQL表结构，请结合表结构和查询结果回答用户问题。

CREATE TABLE students (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(100),
    age INTEGER,
    phone VARCHAR(20),
    gender VARCHAR(10)
);

CREATE TABLE courses (
    course_id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY,
    course_name VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE enrollments (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    student_id INTEGER REFERENCES students(id),
    course_id INTEGER REFERENCES courses(course_id),
    score INTEGER
);
</code></pre>
<p><img src="https://img2023.cnblogs.com/blog/2105804/202505/2105804-20250502171116221-1469994315.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<h3 id="效果验证">效果验证</h3>
<p>保存后测试，如“学生总数是多少”。</p>
<p><img src="https://img2023.cnblogs.com/blog/2105804/202505/2105804-20250502171150567-793257040.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>

<p><img src="https://img2023.cnblogs.com/blog/2105804/202505/2105804-20250502171235838-1129856719.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>再问“年龄最大的学生是谁”，同样查询成功。</p>
<p><img src="https://img2023.cnblogs.com/blog/2105804/202505/2105804-20250502171726621-2062214468.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>测试复杂问题，如“哪些学生选修了数学课，分数最高前三名”。</p>
<p><img src="https://img2023.cnblogs.com/blog/2105804/202505/2105804-20250502171955308-42647684.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>AI可联合三表查询，准确返回结果。通过MCP server对接数据库，结构化数据检索效果远超普通知识库。</p>
<h2 id="超长上下文模型的应用">超长上下文模型的应用</h2>
<p>此外，还可利用支持超长上下文的模型，将资料直接拖入对话框。</p>
<p><img src="https://img2023.cnblogs.com/blog/2105804/202505/2105804-20250503183743273-919876114.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<h3 id="模型窗口进化与测试">模型窗口进化与测试</h3>
<p>如上图，近两年模型上下文窗口大幅提升。例如Gemini 2.0 Pro已支持2000万token，可容纳四大名著。以下以Gemini为例测试。</p>
<h3 id="api密钥获取与模型配置">API密钥获取与模型配置</h3>
<p>访问谷歌<a href="https://aistudio.google.com/prompts/new_chat" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow">AI Studio</a>（需魔法上网）。</p>
<p><img src="https://img2023.cnblogs.com/blog/2105804/202505/2105804-20250503212258737-725837697.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>右上角“Get API Key”，点击创建API密钥。</p>
<p><img src="https://img2023.cnblogs.com/blog/2105804/202505/2105804-20250503212344877-1566637495.png" alt="" loading="lazy"><br>
<img src="https://img2023.cnblogs.com/blog/2105804/202505/2105804-20250503212431490-329696442.png" alt="" loading="lazy"><br>
<img src="https://img2023.cnblogs.com/blog/2105804/202505/2105804-20250503212516239-1127279215.png" alt="" loading="lazy"><br>
<img src="https://img2023.cnblogs.com/blog/2105804/202505/2105804-20250503212535839-1744739002.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>复制API密钥。</p>
<p><img src="https://img2023.cnblogs.com/blog/2105804/202505/2105804-20250503212629658-840250911.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>回到Cherry Studio，设置模型服务商为Gemini，填写API密钥。</p>
<p><img src="https://img2023.cnblogs.com/blog/2105804/202505/2105804-20250503212804792-538338252.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>添加模型，点击“添加”，模型ID可在AI Studio选择。以Gemini 2.0 Flash为例，支持100万token上下文，且有免费额度。</p>
<p><img src="https://img2023.cnblogs.com/blog/2105804/202505/2105804-20250503213056459-1247386115.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>复制Gemini 2.0 Flash模型ID。</p>
<p><img src="https://img2023.cnblogs.com/blog/2105804/202505/2105804-20250503213130872-306646372.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>回到Cherry Studio，填写模型ID并添加。</p>
<p><img src="https://img2023.cnblogs.com/blog/2105804/202505/2105804-20250503213157595-720218844.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>切换聊天模型为Gemini 2.0 Flash。</p>
<p><img src="https://img2023.cnblogs.com/blog/2105804/202505/2105804-20250503213328438-207026357.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>清空助手默认Prompt。</p>
<p><img src="https://img2023.cnblogs.com/blog/2105804/202505/2105804-20250503213628986-541298973.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<h3 id="知识库检索实战">知识库检索实战</h3>
<p>测试知识库能力。以全本《三国演义》为例，用VSCode将张飞武器改为“丈九棒棒糖”，保存。</p>
<p><img src="https://img2023.cnblogs.com/blog/2105804/202505/2105804-20250503221123661-992705853.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>将全本《三国演义》拖入对话框，提问：“张飞造了什么兵器，请找到原文位置并据此回答。”</p>
<p><img src="https://img2023.cnblogs.com/blog/2105804/202505/2105804-20250503221214431-1988960764.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>AI成功检索到答案，第一回中张飞造“丈九棒棒糖”。本次任务消耗551266 token。</p>
<p><img src="https://img2023.cnblogs.com/blog/2105804/202505/2105804-20250503221403369-876391247.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>整个《三国演义》仅用了一半上下文窗口。利用Gemini超长上下文进行知识库检索，效率极高。</p>
<h2 id="总结与展望">总结与展望</h2>
<p>AI知识库常被称为“demo五分钟，上线一年”。目前AI知识库仍是复杂系统工程，无通用银弹，项目落地需多工具协作。当前效果较好的方案是自适应RAG，根据查询类型自动选择检索策略，结合多种方式提升精度。本文到此结束.</p>
